subject: Track and Field
Hurricane Katrina
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Bradley Sylve’s success as a high school sprinter despite not having a track to train on reflects the spirit of the lower Plaquemines Parish, a county still recovering from Hurricane Katrina.
snippet: Bradley Sylve’s success as a high school sprinter despite not having a track to train on reflects the spirit of the lower Plaquemines Parish, a county still recovering from Hurricane Katrina.
